text: Our country is full of heavy hearts today as we say goodbye to John McCain. We share a profound sense of gratitude for the life John lived, and the legacy of service and unwavering commitment he’s left us to cherish.

California took a step toward a fairer justice system by abolishing cash bail. People should not be forced to stay in jail before their trial simply because they cannot afford their bail. https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/california-abolishes-cash-bail-aiming-to-treat-rich-and-poor-defendants-equally/2018/08/29/70891a9e-abad-11e8-b1da-ff7faa680710_story.html

Beautiful rendition of Oh Danny Boy at ⁦@SenJohnMcCain⁩ funeral. A powerful remembrance of an American hero, who fought & bled for our Nation. The remarks by ⁦@MeghanMcCain were particularly powerful, showing a daughter’s love for her father. May he Rest In Peace. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DmBjrwJXoAAzSLd.jpg

Really sad: Hollywood erases American flag from moon landing. This is wrong, and consistent with Leftists’ disrespecting the flag & denying American exceptionalism. JFK saw that it mattered that America go to the moon — why can’t Hollywood see that today? https://www.dailywire.com/news/35314/hollywood-just-cut-flag-out-moon-landing-heres-why-ben-shapiro

President Trump stepping in to hide 100,000 pages of Judge Kavanaugh’s record from the American people is unprecedented. It begs the question - what are they working together to hide? https://twitter.com/ap/status/1035706128125050880 QT @AP Trump administration withholding more than 100,000 pages of court nominee Brett Kavanaugh's records from Bush White House. https://apnews.com/70b1f649aad7404baa11949b50d715c6?utm_medium=AP&utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow
Proud to join members of both parties from all parts of the country to celebrate the life of a great American, my colleague Senator McCain.

"John understood as JFK understood, as Ronald Reagan understood, that part of what makes our country great is that our membership is based not on our bloodline, not on what we look like. But on adherence to a common creed that all of us are created equal.” — Barack Obama
President Obama did not assert executive privilege over a single page of Elena Kagan’s White House Counsel record when she was nominated to the Supreme Court. ZERO.

It’s time to expand on the progress we celebrate on Labor Day. That means fighting to raise the federal minimum wage, make public colleges and universities tuition-free, and guarantee everyone in America has health care.

Kavanaugh’s hearings start on Tuesday. We still haven’t seen thousands, if not millions, of documents from his career. And now, the White House is claiming executive privilege, so they can't release 100,000 pages of Kavanaugh's records. What are they hiding?
RT @AndrewGillum Money doesn’t vote, people do.

41% of college students are skipping meals to be able to afford textbooks which have skyrocketed in cost in recent years. This absurdity must end and it’s time to make public colleges and universities tuition-free across the country. https://www.axios.com/college-textbooks-expensive-overpriced-students-poll-469a89fc-f80f-4595-98cb-2a33170ba235.html

"Freedom is never really won. You earn it and win it in every generation." —Coretta Scott King 

It is the very nature of our nation’s history that whatever gains we make won’t be permanent. It is incumbent upon every one of us to continue to fight for our future. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DmDHT5nX0AE8EHv.jpg

This is why we fight for a fair economy. This is why we fight for billionaires and corporations to pay their fair share in taxes. This is why unions are necessary. This is why we demand living wages. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/almost-half-of-americans-cant-pay-for-basic-needs/

We must end U.S. support for this disastrous war in Yemen. It is also long past time that we begin to take a very hard look at our relationship with Saudi Arabia. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/08/28/opinion/us-yemen-saudi-arabia-trump-civilian-casualties.html

There is simply no question as to whose side the Trump administration is really on. Not the working class. Just the ruling class. https://www.commondreams.org/news/2018/08/31/just-hours-after-ordering-pay-cut-millions-public-workers-trump-proposes-100-billion

Remember that this president is an unindicted co-conspirator in a felony criminal investigation and should not have the ability to appoint someone to a lifetime position on the Supreme Court. Kavanaugh's hearing should be delayed until the investigation is resolved.

I’m proud to be supporting @AndrewGillum, @staceyabrams, and @BenJealous. We live in an unprecedented moment in American history, and we need an unprecedented response. Let’s stand with them and reshape history this November. https://theintercept.com/2018/08/29/andrew-gillum-stacey-abrams-ben-jealous-black-governors/
